TextView.android:text:
Dublin Bus Assist aims to provide more accurate real time passenger information by flagging any buses that could prove unreliable.

 To Use this application, simply enter the desired stop number you wish to search for in the field on the 'Search by Stop Number' page.

 Press Get Buses, and your results will be displayed. 

 Any buses that could be problematic will be flagged with three asterisks '***'
